item.title: My personal website
item.description: i’m from an non cs background and i thought it would be hard to make website but crossroads really breaked all my myth it was actually pretty easy to make a responive simple website. I learned a lot about html css bootstrap and javascript,from web desiging challenge from crossroads youtube channel, But with julio codes youtube tutorial i started to make a website of my dreams.

item.title: CORONAGO Game
item.description: I was so bored during quarentine and think about my childhood dreams and one was making my own game. I learnt a lot of python through many tutorials and completed two nptel courses and i was looking forward to do a project and the pygame concept shook me. I just modified simple space invader to my own styled corona game using freecodecamp youtube video checkout my instagram for more info üòç

item.title: Data science salary estimator
item.description: Created a tool that estimates data science salaries to help data scientists negotiate their income when they get a job. Scraped over 1000 job descriptions from glassdoor using python and selenium Engineered features from the text of each job description to quantify the value companies put on python, excel, aws, and spark. Optimized Linear, Lasso, and Random Forest Regressors using GridsearchCV to reach the best model. Built a client facing API using flask Link to github repository

item.title: Employee Absenteeism
item.description: This was my first poject in data sciene it took me approx about two month to complete this udemy course, but it was worth the time i studied my important facts and shortcut to quickly understand the data science whole working part. Currently, organizations are seeking to find the main causes behind absence. This subject has been studied before decades form a different perspective. THE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO FIND 120 EMPLOYEES ABSENTEEISM FACTORS BASED ON DATA ANALYSIS

item.title: Contact
item.description: Please feel free to contact me, it’s always free and open, i will reach you ASAP üòâ Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
